manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Fabulous Frannie Fabulous Frannie is dedicated to creating goods that benefit the mind, body, soul and of course the environment. We savor the simplicity and honesty of products made in small batches by people who really care about their creations. Simply put, we're devoted to making the natural lifestyle affordable, fun and easy! We here at Fabulous Frannie look to achieve a higher standard with every item you purchase, because as my grandmother Frannie used to say, “If you want to be the best, you have to give your best.” And that's exactly what we do with everything we produce. Our specially crafted and out-of-the-ordinary creations include: 100% pure Essential Oils and Blends, Carrier Oils, Roll-Ons, Massage Spritz, Herbal Soaps, Bath Salts, Soy Wax Melties, Candles, Lip Balms, Beard Oil, Beard Wax, Shave Soap, After Shave, Cleaning Products, Accessories and much more.

How can Essential Oils be Used Diffusers/Vaporizers: Aromatic BathsBody and Hair Care ProductsCompressesMassageInhalations Why should you dilute essential oils Did you know that pure essential oils are 1000 times more potent than their leafy counterparts? That’s why diluting them with another substance, such as a carrier oil, lotion or shampoo, is so important. Here's a way to use Essential Oils Essential oils are a great addition to any household-cleaning regimen. This spring, swap out your cleaning supplies for ones made with all-natural ingredients. All-Purpose Cleaner Ingredients: 1 c. White vinegar1 c. Distilled Water8-10 drops Lemon Essential OilPlastic spray bottle Combine all ingredients in bottle. Shake well before each use. Safety Precautions for Essential Oils As you all know, essential oils provide endless benefits to your well-being. With that being said, there are some safety precautions to take when using these beneficial oils. As with all essential oils, never use them undiluted. Do not take internally unless working with a qualified and expert practitioner. Keep away from children and pets. If applying an essential oil to your skin always perform a small patch test to an insensitive part of the body (after you have properly diluted the oil in an appropriate carrier).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This soap loses some of it's color and scent after the first use,but is still a nice soap with a good smell after frequent uses.
reviews.reviewText: I received this Patchouli Natural Herbal bar soap quickly and safely. It was well packaged. Right out of the package the soap had a strong scent, not quite the way I remember Patchouli but it's difficult to exactly remember a scent I haven't smelled in 40 years! It was a good smell, and I was eager to try it. I used it in the shower, where I have built in recesses in the tile for soap, razors, shampoo, etc. As soon as the soap got wet, the colors in the soap started to drip and run down the shower wall. The soap is good quality, but after the first shower and the colors running, I suspect that most of the scent was in the outer layer of the soap bar.However, it does still smell like Patchouli after several uses, though not nearly as strong as the first use. It is a nice soap.

reviews.reviewText: Feels great, smells great and lasts..
